nodes.text: Ronto-less Garden Wrap was a dish similar to the original Ronto Wrap, but did not contain ronto meat. Instead, the wrap included a plant-based sausage topped with spicy vegetable slaw, pickled vegetables, and sauce, and was served wrapped in a flatbread called a ronto wrapper. In 34 ABY, it was available at Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu, where Ronto Roasters served it to beings whose diet did not include animal products. It was suitable for consumption by humans.

Ronto-less Garden Wraps were added to the real-world Ronto Roasters restaurant in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge at Disneyland Park on October 16, 2019. The menu description is, "Plant-based Sausage, spicy Kimchi Slaw, sweet Pickled Cucumber, Plant-based Gochujang Spread, wrapped in Pita."
